title: Customer Service Rep/Appt Setter
job_overview:
We are seeking a skilled customer service representative with experience in eCommerce & B2B.

The ideal candidate will manage customer inquiries, complaints, refunds etc. for our Shopify store effectively via email and chat, while also being responsible for appointment setting via LinkedIn and email for our B2B contracts. Our B2B contracts are in the dental industry.

You should have excellent communication skills, a proactive approach, and the ability to multitask in a fast-paced environment. 

If you are passionate about delivering outstanding customer experiences and can also assist with B2B coordination, we would love to hear from you!

Please note: candidates that have not directly worked in customer service and B2B appt setting will not be selected for an interview- so please only apply if you have the experience above.

Write 44 in your response, so we know you have read the whole post.
